<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Watchful Gaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=2809) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Goloma" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=381" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You use your many eyes to look in all directions at once, making you extremely observant for a short period of time. You gain [all-around vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=1) until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

<title level="2">Watchful Gaze leads to...</title>
[Constant Gaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=2812)
name: Watchful Gaze
